lanserverproperties.gui.online_mode_desc: This option will be set to allow offline players to join
lanserverproperties.gui.port_error: ⓧ:It must be a number and the port number must be a number greater than 1023 and less than 65535
lanserverproperties.gui.port_warm: (!):It is not recommended to be greater than 49152
